scripts.preinstall: npm i aws-cdk@1.57.0 && pip install awscli-local && npm i npm-run-all@4.1.5
scripts.create-stack:sqs: cdk synth sqs --c env=local > tmp/sqs.template.yml; awslocal cloudformation create-stack --stack-name local-sqs-stack --template-body file://./tmp/sqs.template.yml
scripts.create-stack:s3: cdk synth s3 --context env=local > tmp/s3.template.yml; awslocal cloudformation create-stack --stack-name local-s3-stack --template-body file://./tmp/s3.template.yml
scripts.create-stack:dynamodb: cdk synth dynamodb --context env=local > tmp/dynamodb.template.yml; awslocal cloudformation create-stack --stack-name local-dynamodb-stack --template-body file://./tmp/dynamodb.template.yml
scripts.create-stack:ecr: cdk synth ecr --context env=local > tmp/ecr.template.yml; awslocal cloudformation create-stack --stack-name local-ecr-stack --template-body file://./tmp/ecr.template.yml
scripts.create-stack:lambda: sbt helloWorld/assembly && awslocal lambda --region ap-northeast-1 create-function --function-name=hello-world --role=whatever --runtime=java8 --handler=sample.App --zip-file fileb://modules/adapter/presentation/helloworld/target/scala-2.13/helloworld.jar
scripts.create-stack:stepfunctions: cdk synth stepfunctions --context env=local > tmp/stepfunctions.template.yml; awslocal cloudformation create-stack --stack-name local-stepfunctions-stack --template-body file://./tmp/stepfunctions.template.yml && awslocal stepfunctions list-state-machines
scripts.create-stack:all: run-s create-stack:sqs create-stack:s3 create-stack:dynamodb create-stack:ecr create-stack:lambda create-stack:stepfunctions
scripts.delete-stack:all: run-s delete-stack:sqs delete-stack:dynamodb delete-stack:ecr delete-stack:lambda-helloworld delete-stack:stepfunctions delete-stack:s3
scripts.deploy:lambda: sbt helloWorld/assembly && cdk deploy lambda --profile gray -c env=local
scripts.zip: cd runtime-sample && chmod 755 bootstrap libsunec.so && zip function.zip bootstrap libsunec.so
